Cybersecurity Concepts Hub

Explore beginner-friendly cybersecurity concepts, tools, and techniques. Concepts are organized by category for easy browsing.

Network Security

  • Firewall

    A firewall is a network security device that monitors and controls incoming and outgoing traffic based on security rules.

    →
  • VPN

    A VPN creates a secure, encrypted tunnel for your internet traffic. It protects data, privacy, and access across networks.

    →
  • SD-WAN

    SD-WAN is a virtual WAN architecture that uses software to manage connectivity, traffic, and security across wide area networks.

    →
  • SASE

    SASE is a cloud-delivered architecture that combines networking and security, letting users connect safely from anywhere.

    →
